entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
